questions.question: What is the relationship between machine code and assembly language?
options: Assembly language is a programming language.
One way: assembly language is converted to machine language.

questions.question: Which of the following is included in the rax register? Check all that apply.
How many bits does the rax register have?
How many bits does the eax register have?
How many bits does the ax register have?
If al is set to 0x05 and ax is set to 0x00000020, and rax is set to 0x0000000000000000, show the final complete content of the complex rax register.
What does the rip register refer to?
options: Used to access data stored on the stack.
Points to the next instruction to be executed.
This is not a current valid register.
Points to the current top of the stack.

questions.question: What does the rsp register refer to?
options: This is not a current valid register.
Points to the current top of the stack.
Points to the next instruction to be executed.
Used to access data stored on the stack.
